item.title: By: Koen Verbeeck

item.description: Hi Kyle, thanks for the nice words. I do not have experience though with setting-up TFS unfortunately.
item.content:encoded: Hi Kyle, thanks for the nice words. I do not have experience though with setting-up TFS unfortunately.

item.title: By: Kyle
item.dc:creator: Kyle
item.description:
This was an excellent article for building a single demo server. Do you have any experience with installing and integrating TFS (Team Foundation Server) on the same server? If not, do you have any resources that can help me with integrating TFS after all these BI services have been installed.
Thanks.
item.content:encoded:
This was an excellent article for building a single demo server. Do you have any experience with installing and integrating TFS (Team Foundation Server) on the same server? If not, do you have any resources that can help me with integrating TFS after all these BI services have been installed.

Thanks.

item.title: By: Koen Verbeeck
item.dc:creator: Koen Verbeeck
item.description: @Nick: to be honest, my experience just goes as far as creating my own demo environment. For farm questions, you probably want to be at an actual SharePoint specialist.
item.content:encoded: @Nick: to be honest, my experience just goes as far as creating my own demo environment. For farm questions, you probably want to be at an actual SharePoint specialist.
